completeStoryDesc.cn:
水泥丛林中，出逃到这里的公主和天空城堡的骑士相遇。“外面来了一个坏术师，她和她的手下正在破坏我们的山谷！”天空骑士这么说道，“山谷的勇士们需要帮助！”
兴奋的公主加入天空骑士打败坏术师的队伍，冒险就此开始！
completeStoryDesc.en:
Twas in the concrete jungle where the escaping Princess ran into the Knights from the Castle in the Sky. "An Evil Caster from a foreign land has arrived with her minions. They are destroying our valley!" so sayeth the Knights of the Sky, "The Warriors of the Valley need our help!" 
The excited Princess thus joined the Knights of the Sky and defeated Evil Caster's team. And that was how their adventures began!

normalStoryDesc.cn: 水泥丛林中，出逃到这里的公主和天空城堡的骑士相遇。“外面来了一个坏术师，她和她的手下正在破坏我们的山谷！”天空骑士这么说道，“山谷的勇士们需要帮助！”
normalStoryDesc.en: Twas in the concrete jungle where the escaping Princess ran into the Knights from the Castle in the Sky. "An Evil Caster from a foreign land has arrived with her minions. They are destroying our valley!" so sayeth the Knights of the Sky, "The Warriors of the Valley need our help!"

completeStoryDesc.cn:
“公主不见啦，难道是坏术师又回来报仇了？”好术师带着几个勇士来到最高的塔下，“这是山谷里最高的塔，一定能看到坏术师在哪里！”勇士们就此开始寻找卡莉公主！
塔真高啊，星星都被接到了塔上！
completeStoryDesc.en:
"The Princess has gone missing! Is Evil Caster back for revenge?" With that, Good Caster and fellow warriors arrived at the tallest tower. "This is the tallest tower of the valley. It will show us where Evil Caster is!" And thus the warriors began their search for Princess Carly! 
The tower is so tall it could even attract the stars!

normalStoryDesc.cn: “公主不见啦，难道是坏术师又回来报仇了？”好术师带着几个勇士来到最高的塔下，“这是山谷里最高的塔，一定能看到坏术师在哪里！”勇士们就此开始寻找卡莉公主！
normalStoryDesc.en: "The Princess has gone missing! Is Evil Caster back for revenge?" With that, Good Caster and fellow warriors arrived at the tallest tower. "This is the tallest tower of the valley. It will show us where Evil Caster is!" And thus the warriors began their search for Princess Carly!

completeStoryDesc.cn:
坏术师和她的手下曾经攻击了这里的城堡，但她最厉害的手下也曾在这里被天空骑士击败！暴怒的坏术师只能堵住大桥，灰溜溜地跑了！现在，鲁珀勇士正向那几个头上冒火的怪物冲去！
公主最喜欢的茶杯被打碎了，太坏了！
completeStoryDesc.en:
Evil Caster and her minions once attacked this castle, but her most powerful minion was once defeated at this very spot by the Knights of the Sky! Evil Caster was so mad and angry that she blocked the bridge and ran away in a huff! Now, the Lupo warrior is rushing at the monsters with burning heads! 
She also smashed the Princess's favorite teacup! What an evil, nasty, big bad!

normalStoryDesc.cn: 坏术师和她的手下曾经攻击了这里的城堡，但她最厉害的手下也曾在这里被天空骑士击败！暴怒的坏术师只能堵住大桥，灰溜溜地跑了！现在，鲁珀勇士正向那几个头上冒火的怪物冲去！
normalStoryDesc.en: Evil Caster and her minions once attacked this castle, but her most powerful minion was once defeated at this very spot by the Knights of the Sky! Evil Caster was so mad and angry that she blocked the bridge and ran away in a huff! Now, the Lupo warrior is rushing at the monsters with burning heads!

completeStoryDesc.cn:
巨大的长臂机器人坐在石头上。大家喜欢在它的脚边玩耍，公主也很喜欢！机器人看着举着长剑的勇士说道：“我要搬去别的地方，帮不了你们，再见勇士们。”
公主也曾来过这里！
completeStoryDesc.en:
The giant long-armed robot sat on a rock. Everyone, Princess included, love playing near its feet! The robot looked at the warrior with the sword and boomed: "I am going to another place and won't be able to help you any more. Farewell, my brave warriors." 
Princess was here too!

normalStoryDesc.cn: 巨大的长臂机器人坐在石头上。大家喜欢在它的脚边玩耍，公主也很喜欢！机器人看着举着长剑的勇士说道：“我要搬去别的地方，帮不了你们，再见勇士们。”
normalStoryDesc.en: The giant long-armed robot sat on a rock. Everyone, Princess included, love playing near its feet! The robot looked at the warrior with the sword and boomed: "I am going to another place and won't be able to help you any more. Farewell, my brave warriors."

completeStoryDesc.cn:
穿过洞穴外挂着的蓝色长布，勇士们遇到了很少见的龙！“喂喂喂，我不是坏术师，我是来帮你们带回公主的！”
龙兴冲冲地加入了队伍。
completeStoryDesc.en:
The warriors passed through the blue linens hanging outside the caves and ran into a very rare Lung! "HEY! STOP! I'm not Evil Caster! I'm here to help you rescue the Princess!" 
With that, the Lung happily joined the team.

normalStoryDesc.cn: 穿过洞穴外挂着的蓝色长布，勇士们遇到了很少见的龙！“喂喂喂，我不是坏术师，我是来帮你们带回公主的！”
normalStoryDesc.en: The warriors passed through the blue linens hanging outside the caves and ran into a very rare Lung! "HEY! STOP! I'm not Evil Caster! I'm here to help you rescue the Princess!"

completeStoryDesc.cn:
“石头树苗！”手里拿着双铳的勇士激动地说道，“天空骑士曾经在这里和一个怪物战斗。打败怪物后，救出了石头大树的幼苗！”
原来怪物一直关着石头大树的树苗。
completeStoryDesc.en:
"Stony sapling!" the warrior wielding two handcannons said excitedly, "The Knights of the Sky once fought a great monster here. They defeated the monster and saved the baby sapling of the Big, Big Oak of Stone!"
It turns out that the monster had imprisoned the baby sapling of the Big, Big Oak of Stone!

normalStoryDesc.cn: “石头树苗！”手里拿着双铳的勇士激动地说道，“天空骑士曾经在这里和一个怪物战斗。打败怪物后，救出了石头大树的幼苗！”
normalStoryDesc.en: "Stony sapling!" the warrior wielding two handcannons said excitedly, "The Knights of the Sky once fought a great monster here. They defeated the monster and saved the baby sapling of the Big, Big Oak of Stone!"

completeStoryDesc.cn:
“看，那就是天空骑士打败坏术师的地方！”手上冒出电火花的勇士指着那扇两边飘着火焰的城堡大门。没有看见笼罩城堡的黑云，也没有坏术师和她的手下。但勇士们相信，公主就在里面呢！
“我要走了。”“还回来吗？”“大家需要，天空骑士就会回来。”
completeStoryDesc.en:
"Look! That's where the Knights of the Sky defeated Evil Caster!" the warrior whose hands give off electrical sparks said while pointing at the flaming castle gates. There were no looming dark clouds, and no Evil Caster or her minions. But the warriors believe the Princess was right inside!
"I am leaving." "Will you come back?" "The Knights of the Sky shall return when the people need us again."

normalStoryDesc.cn: “看，那就是天空骑士打败坏术师的地方！”手上冒出电火花的勇士指着那扇两边飘着火焰的城堡大门。没有看见笼罩城堡的黑云，也没有坏术师和她的手下。但勇士们相信，公主就在里面呢！
normalStoryDesc.en: "Look! That's where the Knights of the Sky defeated Evil Caster!" the warrior whose hands give off electrical sparks said while pointing at the flaming castle gates. There were no looming dark clouds, and no Evil Caster or her minions. But the warriors believe the Princess was right inside!
